actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Executive Comment Requested from Navy.

actions.subcommittee: Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials.
Ordered to be Reported (Amended).
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Armed Services. H. Rept. 102-433.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 261.
Mr. Bennett moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 5, rule I, the chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.
Considered as unfinished business.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays (2/3 required): 414 - 0 (Roll No. 18).
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.
Cleared for White House.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Measure Signed in Senate.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 102-255.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials

official_title: To permit the transfer before the expiration of the otherwise applicable 60-day congressional review period of the obsolete training aircraft carrier U.S.S. Lexington to the city of Corpus Christi, Texas, for use as a naval museum and memorial.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Navy to transfer the obsolete training aircraft carrier USS Lexington to the city of Corpus Christi, Texas, for use as a naval museum and memorial, notwithstanding the required 60-day waiting period following congressional notification.

titles.title: To permit the transfer before the expiration of the otherwise applicable 60-day congressional review period of the obsolete training aircraft carrier U.S.S. Lexington to the city of Corpus Christi, Texas, for use as a naval museum and memorial.
